Please try again later.

Failed to get Facebook birthdays content.

SCAN_ERROR_BIRTHDAYS_EXTRACT.message:
Failed to extract birthdays from fetched data.

SCAN_ERROR_TIMEOUT.message: It take too long to fulfill extraction process. Please try again.

SCAN_ERROR_GENERAL.message:
Something went wrong. It happens sometime...
Please try again later.
